abstract: An unknown number of blank prescription forms have been stolen from New York City hospitals over the past several years in what investigators believe is a scheme by gang members to make money from addicts desperate for prescription painkillers; bulk of the thefts have occurred at hospitals run by the New York City Health and Hospital Corporations, which operates public hospitals.
